verbs.description: Rolling Stones star Keith Richards [V: has] told of the band 's bad experience with Donald Trump before he became US president .
[ARG0: Rolling Stones star Keith Richards] has [V: told] [ARG1: of the band 's bad experience with Donald Trump before he became US president] .
Rolling Stones star Keith Richards has told of the band 's bad experience with Donald Trump before [ARG1: he] [V: became] [ARG2: US president] .
